desc: Lurvee's natural deodorant gives you 12 hours of odor protection. Made with plant and mineral based ingredients like shea butter, coconut oil, alum stone, helps absorbing excess moisture and soothing skin.

layout.text: NATURAL DEODORANT THAT ACTUALLY WORKS. WITH SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE FORMULAS TO NEUTRALIZE ODOR & LONG LASTING ODOR PROTECTION.
